duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare patients for physician examination by gathering patient information, performing vital signs assessment, and medication reconciliation.
Assist in obtaining patient referrals for appointments and procedures.
Prepare patient charts and review necessary documents and test results prior to appointments.
Perform virtual check-in/check-out for patient visits and assist with incoming phone calls.
Schedule referrals and tests, and maintain exam rooms for necessary supplies and cleanliness.
Aid physicians during treatment, examination, and testing of patients as appropriate.
Maintain patient recall system for reminders of GI procedures due.
Perform prior authorizations for medications and services as required, and travel to satellite office when necessary.
Maintain clean and orderly work area, patient confidentiality, and a professional office atmosphere.
Perform other medical support duties as assigned.
Maintain a professional atmosphere in all aspects of the office and interaction with physicians, management, and patients.
Maintain a professional atmosphere in all aspects of the office, including interaction with physicians, management, patients, and all outside contacts.
Perform other medical support duties as assigned.
